explains: n. 广播公司；广播员；播送设备；撒播物

sentences.en: Alliss retired from golf in 1969 and went on to become a successful broadcaster.
sentences.cn: 埃利斯1969年结束了专业高尔夫运动生涯，继而成为了一名成功的播音员。

sentences.en: If you haven't noticed, the backstreet boy educated at Blackpool grammar styles himself more grandly as Alastair Cooke, broadcaster extraordinaire.
sentences.cn: 如果你还没有注意到，这个在布莱克浦语法学校接受教育的后街男孩把自己塑造成阿拉斯泰尔·库克——一个出色的播音员。

sentences.en: The letter was received by the broadcaster yesterday.
sentences.cn: 播音员在昨天收到了这封信。
